DOC.brief_summary: Three dose primary vaccination study reactogenicity immunogenicity healthy infant 6-12 week age time first vaccination Streptococcus pneumoniae .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Immunogenicity Study GlaxoSmithKline ( GSK ) Biologicals ' 10-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine .
DOC.detailed_description: Test group : 2 ( 120 subjects/group ) . 1 group receive GSK Biologicals ' 10-valent pneumococcal conjugate vaccine + DTPa combine vaccine ; Control group receive GSK Biologicals ' Havrix + DTPa combine vaccine
